name: NewYorker
text: As @Isabelwilkerson researched the Jim Crow system in the South, she realized that "every aspect of life was so tightly controlled and scripted and restricted" that the only word to capture it was "caste." Listen here, or wherever you get your podcasts. https://t.co/eepbfj2uaZ

name: NewYorker
text: Whatever the reason—ostentatious littering, the mad desire for a furtive lockdown high—nitrous-oxide cannisters are ubiquitous in London this summer. https://t.co/LcDr4gb5CN

name: NewYorker
text: Given what you know of the Trump Administration, @BillMcKibben writes, you may not be shocked to learn that—hidden away behind a wall of acronyms—it is doing its best to stall the trend toward ethical investing. https://t.co/mS6Tlo5i9z
